entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Snow or rain beginning late this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
